popilot.commandLineArgs: agent "Create a new task for Manuel to 'Refine Backlog' in the next two sprints (after the current sprint) with 20% of his available capacity."

agent "Go through all work items in this query https://dev.azure.com/mnsdc/AzureDevOpsExperiments/_queries/query-edit/a2871f4b-e5d2-42d7-8279-844a34830cc7/ and decide for each if it is 'Technical' or 'Organisational' work and add the corresponding tag." -s
